thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 11 of 150
thread.title: Ashley

author: Ashley
title: Ashley
text: I ordered my items online. I showed up showed my ID and my order and two very friendly gentleman loaded two mattresses into the back of my car. They even tied down the back to secure it in to make sure that nothing would slip or slide in my transit home. I had my puppy with me and they were both very friendly and kind to my puppy as well. A great experience all around!! ü§ôüèº
